SqlDefinition.SqlCommand: SELECT COUNT(0) AS row_count FROM b_category WHERE Category_ID=@@Category_ID@@,Parent_Category_ID=@@Parent_Category_ID@@,Category_Name_CH=@@Category_Name_CH@@,Category_Name_HK=@@Category_Name_HK@@,Category_Status=@@Category_Status@@,Category_Seq=@@Category_Seq@@,Create_Time=@@Create_Time@@,Create_UserId=@@Create_UserId@@,Create_User=@@Create_User@@,Update_Time=@@Update_Time@@,Update_UserId=@@Update_UserId@@,Update_User=@@Update_User@@; SELECT Category_ID,Parent_Category_ID,Category_Name_CH,Category_Name_HK,Category_Status,Category_Seq,Create_Time,Create_UserId,Create_User,Update_Time,Update_UserId,Update_User FROM b_category WHERE Category_ID=@@Category_ID@@,Parent_Category_ID=@@Parent_Category_ID@@,Category_Name_CH=@@Category_Name_CH@@,Category_Name_HK=@@Category_Name_HK@@,Category_Status=@@Category_Status@@,Category_Seq=@@Category_Seq@@,Create_Time=@@Create_Time@@,Create_UserId=@@Create_UserId@@,Create_User=@@Create_User@@,Update_Time=@@Update_Time@@,Update_UserId=@@Update_UserId@@,Update_User=@@Update_User@@ LIMIT <R%= @@StartIndex@@, @@SelectCount@@ %R> ;
